item.title: China's Baidu says weekly robotaxi rides hit 250,000 — same as Alphabet's Waymo this spring
item.description: In the race to prove to regulators and investors that robotaxis have a viable track record, Baidu's Apollo Go is claiming orders on par with Waymo.
